import React, {useContext, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import axios from 'axios' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col} from 'antd'; import { Avatar } from 'antd'; function numberWithCommas(x) { return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); } function Cart() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [cart, setCart] = state.userAPI.cart if(cart.length === 0) return<>

Giỏ hàng (0 sản phẩm)

return ( <>

Gía

); } export default Cart;
